TypeSignature.Value: public interface XMLNode : IDisposable, System.ComponentModel.IComponent, System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

.class public interface auto ansi abstract XMLNode implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize, class System.IDisposable, class System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent

summary.span: 表示文档上单个 XML 节点（可公开事件并可绑定到数据）。

span.span: Represents a single XML node on a document that exposes events and that can be bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您在设计时映射到 Microsoft Office Word 文档上的非重复架构元素时，Visual Studio 将创建允许仅一次出现在文档中每个元素的控件。When you map non-repeating schema elements onto a Microsoft Office Word document at design time, Visual Studio creates an control for each elements that are allowed to appear only once in a document. 非重复架构元素是具有的元素`maxOccurs`特性设置为 1。A non-repeating schema element is an element with the `maxOccurs` attribute set to 1. 在设计时，可以仅在 Word 文档级项目中创建控件。 controls can be created only in Word document-level projects at design time. 也不能在运行时或在应用程序级项目中创建。They cannot be created at run time or in application-level projects. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)并[如何： 向 Word 文档添加 XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnode-controls-to-word-documents.md)。For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md) and [How to: Add XMLNode Controls to Word Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnode-controls-to-word-documents.md). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 当用户向文档添加新的 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user adds a new control to the document.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 代码将显示消息框，然后从文档和之后删除添加到文档。The code displays a message box before an is deleted from the document and after an is added to the document. 此示例还使用方法来删除节点，并以编程方式引发事件。The example also uses the method to delete a node and programmatically raise the event. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`，其中包含一个名为的子节点`CustomerDateNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode` that contains a child node named `CustomerDateNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#200)]

value.span: 一个 ，表示 控件的创建者。

span.span: An that represents the creator of the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以最小化活动应用程序窗口。The following code example uses the property to minimize the active application window. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerLastNameNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerLastNameNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个 集合，该集合表示 控件的特性。

span.span: Gets a collection that represents the attributes for the control.

value.span: 一个 集合，表示 控件的特性。

span.span: A collection that represents the attributes for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有中的控件返回通过使用集合属性具有属性值为。All controls in the collection returned by using the property have a property value of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性添加到属性控件。The following code example uses the property to add an attribute to an control. 属性用于指定架构命名空间。The property is used to specify the schema namespace. 该示例然后循环访问中的每个属性和显示属性名称及其值。The example then iterates through every attribute in the and displays the attribute name and its value. 名称从获取属性。The name of the is obtained from the property. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`具有`NewCustomer`属性在架构中声明。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode` that has a `NewCustomer` attribute declared in the schema. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#2)]

value.span: 控件不带任何前缀的名称。

span.span: The name of the control without any prefix.

[!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当用户从文档中删除 控件时，在删除控件之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user deletes an control from the document, before the control is deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`InUndoRedo`参数是`true`，不应更改文档中的 XML。If the `InUndoRedo` parameter is `true`, you should not change the XML in the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 代码将显示消息框，然后从文档和之后删除添加到文档。The code displays a message box before an is deleted from the document and after an is added to the document. 此示例还使用方法来删除节点，并以编程方式引发事件。The example also uses the method to delete a node and programmatically raise the event. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`，其中包含一个名为的子节点`CustomerDateNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode` that contains a child node named `CustomerDateNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引发此事件更改属性以编程方式修改或用户交互更改。This event is raised if the property is changed is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 有关详细信息的用途有关属性，请参阅类。For more information about the purpose of the property, see the class.

span.span: A collection that represents the child elements of an control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性创建的所有子节点的名称的列表控件。The following code example uses the property to create a list of the names of all child nodes of an control. 它然后在消息框中显示的列表。It then displays the list in a message box. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#3)]

span.span: An collection that represents the elements that may be valid children of the current control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个中集合是允许的 XML 元素的底部列表中的项**XML 结构**任务窗格。Each in an collection is an item in the list of allowed XML elements at the bottom of the **XML Structure** task pane. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用要添加的所有子元素的属性。The following code example uses the property to add all of the child elements of an . 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#4)]

summary.span: 当光标从 节点的上下文外的区域移入该节点或它的一个子节点内时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside an or one of its descendent nodes, from an area outside of the context of the node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 仅当上下文更改时引发事件。The event is raised only when the context changes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)。For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序， ， ，和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 当和将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于该事件。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 当和将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选定的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#201](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#201)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#201](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#201)]

summary.span: 当光标从 控件或它的一个子代节点移到原始节点上下文以外的区域时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is moved from the control, or one of its descendent nodes, to an area outside of the context of the original node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 仅当上下文更改时引发事件。The event is raised only when the context changes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)。For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序， ， ，和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 当和将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于该事件。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 当和将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选定的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#201](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#201)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#201](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#201)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为控件在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建，则此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，它表示字符串"MSWD。"Because the control was created in Microsoft Office Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." 此值还可表示由常数。This value can also be represented by the constant . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来显示一个消息，指示是否控件在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建。The following code example uses the property to display a message indicating whether an control was created in Microsoft Office Word. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能将传递承载于方法或要求的基础对象的属性的控件 ( )。You cannot pass a host control to a method or property that expects the underlying object (a ). 必须使用的属性承载控件来访问基础。You must use the property of the host control to access the underlying . 然后将此对象传递给方法或属性需要。You then pass this object to a method or property that expects a . 有关更多信息，请参见 [宿主项和宿主控件的编程限制](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md)。For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md).

summary.span: 使用来自指定 XML 文件的数据更新 控件

span.span: Updates an control with data from the specified XML file

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会添加其他控件或删除不必要从文档的控件。This method does not add additional controls or delete unnecessary controls from the document. 此方法将更新的所有属性控件。This method updates all attributes of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来填充XML 文件中的数据。The following code example uses the method to fill an with data from an XML file. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. 此示例还假定 XML 文件命名为 Customers.xml，与关联的架构符合`CustomerNode`，D 目录的根目录上存在。This example also assumes that an XML file named Customers.xml, which conforms to the schema associated with `CustomerNode`, exists at the root of the D directory. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#100](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#100)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#100](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#100)]

span.span: Populates an control with data from the specified XML string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会添加其他控件或删除不必要从文档的控件。This method does not add additional controls or delete unnecessary controls from the document. 此方法将更新的所有属性控件。This method updates all attributes of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来填充具有 XML 字符串中的数据控件。The following code example uses the method to fill an control with data from an XML string. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`，且与关联的架构的命名空间和元素的 XML 字符串中所述符合`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`, and the namespace and elements described in the XML string conform to the schema associated with `CustomerNode`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会添加其他控件或删除不必要从文档的控件。This method does not add additional controls or delete unnecessary controls from the document. 此方法将更新的所有属性控件。This method updates all attributes of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来填充中的数据。The following code example uses the method to fill an with data from an . 示例将读取到 XML 文件的内容，加载这到，然后使用有关`document`参数方法。The example reads the contents of an XML file into a , loads this into an , and then uses the for the `document` parameter of the method. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. 此示例还假定 XML 文件命名为 Customers.xml，与关联的架构符合`CustomerNode`，D 目录的根目录上存在。This example also assumes that an XML file named Customers.xml, which conforms to the schema associated with `CustomerNode`, exists at the root of the D directory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以是下列任一值：The property can be one of the following values: - 指示属性节点。 indicates an attribute node. - 指示元素节点。 indicates an element node. 使用属性来确定哪种类型的正在使用，以便不尝试执行无效操作的节点上的节点。Use the property to determine which type of node you are working with so that you do not attempt to perform invalid operations on the node. 例如，属性仅适用于元素节点，但它会显示在列表中的可用属性控件。For example, the property applies only to element nodes, although it appears in the list of available properties for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是否是一个元素或属性的节点。The following code example uses the property to determine whether an is an element or attribute node. 如果是一个元素，此示例将使用属性来设置元素中的文本。If the is an element, the example uses the property to set the text in the element. 如果是一个属性，此示例将使用属性来设置属性值。If the is an attribute, the example uses the property to set the attribute value. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerLastNameNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerLastNameNode`. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the and events. 代码将显示消息框，然后从文档和之后删除添加到文档。The code displays a message box before an is deleted from the document and after an is added to the document. 此示例还使用方法来删除节点，并以编程方式引发事件。The example also uses the method to delete a node and programmatically raise the event. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`，其中包含一个名为的子节点`CustomerDateNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode` that contains a child node named `CustomerDateNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#200](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#200)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#200](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#200)]

summary.span: 当光标置于 控件内时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件不同于事件。The event differs from the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)。For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序， ， ，和事件。The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the , , , and events. 当和将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于该事件。When the and events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event. 当和将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选定的节点的名称。When the and events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#201](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#201)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#201](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#201)]

param.name: XPath
param.span: 有效的 XPath 字符串。

span.span: A valid XPath string.

param.span: 提供架构中用作搜索依据的前缀。

span.span: Provides the prefix in the schema against which to perform the search.

param.span: 如果 XPath 参数使用名称搜索元素，请使用 PrefixMapping 参数。

span.span: Use the PrefixMapping parameter if your XPath parameter uses names to search for elements.

param.name: FastSearchSkippingTextNodes
param.span: 如果为 ，则在搜索指定的节点时，忽略所有文本节点。

span.span: to skip all text nodes while searching for the specified node.

param.span: 如果为 ，则在搜索中包含文本节点。

span.span: to include text nodes in the search.

param.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: Default value is .

summary.span: 获取一个 集合，该集合表示与 参数匹配的所有节点，且以出现在 控件中的顺序为序。

span.span: Gets a collection that represents all the nodes that match the parameter in the order in which they appear in the control.

returns.span: 与 参数匹配的节点，以在 控件中出现的顺序为序。

span.span: The nodes that match the parameter in the order in which they appear in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`false`降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索文本节点中包含文档中的所有节点。Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `false` diminishes performance, because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document for the text contained in the node. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以获取匹配的节点的子集合给定`XPath`参数。The following code example uses the method to get a collection of the child nodes that match the given `XPath` parameter. 该示例然后显示找到的节点数。The example then displays the number of nodes that were found. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`使用匹配的架构元素包含一个或多个名为的子节点`FirstName`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode` with a matching schema element that contains one or more child nodes named `FirstName`. span.span: The first child node that matches the parameter in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`false`降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索文本节点中包含文档中的所有节点。Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `false` diminishes performance because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document for the text contained in the node. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以获取匹配的子节点给定`XPath`参数。The following code example uses the method to get a child node that matches the given `XPath` parameter. 该示例然后显示找到的节点的名称。The example then displays the name of the node that was found. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`使用匹配的架构元素包含一个或多个名为的子节点`LastName`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode` with a matching schema element that contains one or more child nodes named `LastName`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#105](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#105)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#105](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#105)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetValidationError (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus Status, ref object ErrorText, bool ClearedAutomatically = true);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValidationError(valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus Status, object ErrorText, bool ClearedAutomatically) cil managed

param.name: Status
param.span: 值之一，该值指定是设置验证状态错误文本 () 还是清除验证状态错误文本 ()。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether to set the validation status error text () or to clear the validation status error text ().

param.name: ErrorText
param.span: 显示给用户的文本。

span.span: The text displayed to the user.

param.span: 当 Status 参数设置为 时保留为空。

span.span: Leave blank when the Status parameter is set to .

param.name: ClearedAutomatically
param.span: 如果为 ，则在针对指定节点发生下一个验证事件后，立即自动清除错误消息。

span.span: to automatically clear the error message as soon as the next validation event occurs on the specified node.

param.span: 如果为 ，则要求以 Status 参数 运行 方法，以清除自定义错误文本。

span.span: to require running the method with a Status parameter of to clear the custom error text.

summary.span: 更改向用户显示的 控件的验证错误文本，并强制 Microsoft Office Word 将节点报告为无效。

span.span: Changes the validation error text displayed to a user for an control and forces Microsoft Office Word to report a node as invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置自定义错误文本，请使用常量。To set custom error text, use the constant. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法设置的自定义验证错误消息的。The following code example uses the method to set a custom validation error message for an . 事件处理程序事件显示的自定义验证错误消息，如果不会验证。An event handler for the event displays the custom validation error message if the does not validate. 此示例假定当前文档包含两个名为的对象`CustomerAddress1Node`和`CustomerZipNode`，它将映射到具有整数数据类型的架构元素。This example assumes that the current document contains two objects named `CustomerAddress1Node` and `CustomerZipNode` that map to schema elements with an integer data type. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#202](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#202)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#202](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#202)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的无格式纯文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the plain unformatted text of the control.

value.span: 控件的无格式纯文本。

span.span: The plain unformatted text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将替换所有内的文本，包括任何子节点。Setting this property replaces all of the text inside the , including any child nodes. 此属性在设计时是只读的。This property is read-only during design time. 它可以仅设置在运行时。It can only be set during run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的子节点数，将替换内的文本通过使用属性，然后再次显示子节点的数目。The following code example displays the number of child nodes in an , replaces the text inside the by using the property, and then displays the number of child nodes again. 设置后属性，子节点数为零。After setting the property, the number of child nodes is zero. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#19](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#19)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#19](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 根据附加的一个或多个 XML 架构验证单个 控件。

span.span: Validates an individual control against the attached XML schema or schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法替换和属性以确定是否符合应用的架构的 XML 元素和要向用户显示哪些错误文本。Use the method with the and properties to determine whether an XML element is valid according to the applied schema and what error text to display to the user. 使用方法重写自定义验证错误的架构冲突。Use the method to override the schema violations with custom validation errors. 在运行时方法，Microsoft Office Word 填充与具有验证错误的 XML 节点的集合。When you run the method, Microsoft Office Word populates the collection with the XML nodes that have validation errors. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的文本值，并通过使用验证节点方法。The following code example sets the text value of an and validates the node by using the method. 该示例然后使用属性来确定节点是否验证。The example then uses the property to determine whether the node validated. 如果节点尚未验证，则该示例使用属性显示验证错误消息。If the node did not validate, then the example uses the property to display the validation error message. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerAddress1Node`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerAddress1Node`. 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据的架构元素类型，则验证将失败。If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#20](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#20)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#20](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#20)]

summary.span: 当在 控件中存在验证错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when there is a validation error in the control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法设置的自定义验证错误消息的。The following code example uses the method to set a custom validation error message for an . 事件处理程序事件显示的自定义验证错误消息，如果不会验证。An event handler for the event displays the custom validation error message if the does not validate. 此示例假定当前文档包含两个名为的对象`CustomerAddress1Node`和`CustomerZipNode`，它将映射到具有整数数据类型的架构元素。This example assumes that the current document contains two objects named `CustomerAddress1Node` and `CustomerZipNode` that map to schema elements with an integer data type. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#202](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#202)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#202](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#202)]

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串表示对 控件的验证错误的说明。

span.span: Gets a string that represents the description for a validation error on an control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示对 控件的验证错误的说明。

span.span: A string that represents the description for a validation error on an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Advanced`|`true` 若要显示的验证错误说明，来自包含 Microsoft Office Word; 的 MSXML 5.0 组件的高级的版本否则为`false`。`true` to display the advanced version of the validation error description, which comes from the MSXML 5.0 component included with Microsoft Office Word; otherwise, `false`.| 如果您使用而无需指定参数的属性，它返回不适于在代码中直接使用的对象。If you use the property without specifying a parameter, it returns a object that not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的文本值，并通过使用验证节点方法。The following code example sets the text value of an and validates the node by using the method. 该示例然后使用属性来确定节点是否验证。The example then uses the property to determine whether the node validated. 如果节点尚未验证，则该示例使用属性显示验证错误消息。If the node did not validate, then the example uses the property to display the validation error message. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerAddress1Node`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerAddress1Node`. 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据的架构元素类型，则验证将失败。If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#20](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#20)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#20](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定某一元素或特性对于附加的架构是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether an element or attribute is valid according to the attached schema.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以是下列任一值：The property can be one of the following values: - 指示方法用于设置属性设置为自定义文本字符串。 indicates that the method was used to set the property to a custom text string. - 指示 XML 元素或属性有效对于附加的架构。 indicates an XML element or attribute is valid according to the attached schema. 虽然这些都是只有两个命名的常量属性允许，有许多来自中包含的 Microsoft Office Word 的 MSXML 5.0 组件的更多未命名的值。While these are the only two named constants the property allows, there are many more unnamed values that come from the MSXML 5.0 component included with Microsoft Office Word. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的文本值，并通过使用验证节点方法。The following code example sets the text value of an and validates the node by using the method. 该示例然后使用属性来确定节点是否验证。The example then uses the property to determine whether the node validated. 如果节点尚未验证，则该示例使用属性显示验证错误消息。If the node did not validate, then the example uses the property to display the validation error message. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerAddress1Node`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerAddress1Node`. 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据的架构元素类型，则验证将失败。If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#20](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#20)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#20](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取一个 XML 字符串，该字符串以 Microsoft Office Word Open XML 格式表示 。

span.span: Gets an XML string that represents the in the Microsoft Office Word Open XML format.

value.span: 一个 XML 字符串，该字符串以 Microsoft Office Word Open XML 格式表示 。

span.span: An XML string that represents the in the Microsoft Office Word Open XML format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性只返回的 XML 中表示指定的 XML 节点所需的文档。This property returns only the XML in the document that is needed to represent the specified XML node.

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串表示 控件中的 XML 文本。

span.span: Gets a string that represents the XML text in the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 控件中的 XML 文本。

span.span: A string that represents the XML text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`ListTemplate`|`true` 若要返回的而不使用 Word XML 标记中; XML 文本否则为`false`。`true` to return the text of the XML without the Word XML markup; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.| 如果您使用而无需指定参数的属性，它返回不应在代码中直接使用的对象。If you use the property without specifying a parameter, it returns an object that is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来显示的 XML 内容使用和不使用 Word XML 标记。The following code example uses the property to display the XML contents of an with and without the Word XML markup. 此示例假定当前文档，包含名为`CustomerNode`。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerNode`. [!code-csharp[Trin_WordXMLNode#21](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/CS/ThisDocument.cs#21)] [!code-vb[Trin_WordXMLNode#21](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_WordXMLNode/VB/ThisDocument.vb#21)]

summary.span: 使用数据填充 控件。

span.span: Populates an control with data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会添加其他控件或删除不必要从文档的控件。This method does not add additional controls or delete unnecessary controls from the document. 此方法将更新的所有属性控件。This method updates all attributes of the control.
